revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=ESR9855G |revision= |upc=655216004818 |ean= |asin=B003E8X4LW |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/10/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR9855G |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP7150U |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=EnGenius EMP-9605 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F |default_ch= }} "ESR9855G-0.10 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The router is pictured with two Mini PCI slots in the FCC provided internal photos.
The [http://www.engeniustech.com.sg/files/pdf/ESR9855G-15012010.pdf EnGenius datasheet] describes the wireless module as Ralink RT2860+RT2820.. which conflicts with the photos provided to the FCC.
On the [http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Known_incompatible_devices DD-WRT known incompatible devices list].
[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31561-engenius-esr9855g-multimedia-enhanced-wireless-n-gaming-router-with-gigabit-reviewed Reviewed on SmallNetBuilder]
